mapper.sql:
a.*,
gt.id AS "genTable.id",
cu.id AS "createBy.id", cu.username AS "createBy.username", uu.id AS "updateBy.id", uu.username AS "updateBy.username"

LEFT JOIN gen_table gt on gt.id = a.gen_table_id
LEFT JOIN sys_user cu on cu.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user uu on uu.id = a.create_by
mapper.insert:
insert into gen_scheme ( id, name, package_name, module_name, function_name, gen_table_id, function_author,
create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{packageName}, #{moduleName}, #{functionName}, #{genTable.id}, #{functionAuthor},
#{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
